alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Henry, southwestern Clay and northwestern Early Counties through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 355 PM EDT/255 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Fort Gaines, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Haleburg, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Barnes, Hardwickburg, Zetto, Hayes, Pecan, Screamer, Miller, Jones Crossing, Willis Crossroads and Fort Gaines-Clay Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
